content.rendered:
Monday, March 31st  

     Today is a “B” Day 

 

 

  • The bagpiping club will meet today after dismissal in room 222. 

  

  • Attention Pop Culture Icon Club, we are meeting Wednesday, April 2, after school, in the Large Group Room. Please let Ms. Schnorr know if you need a late bus pass. 

 

  • There will be no chamber orchestra rehearsal after school today.  

 

  • Lunch today is pizza crunchers, green beans, veggie w/ hummus AND a rice Krispie treat.  

 

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information! 
 

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!  

 

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
